alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTH CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near North Lewisburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... North Lewisburg, Milford Center, Woodstock, Cable, Mingo, Kennard, Chuckery, Rosedale and State Route 4 at State Route 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
